mention.text: Firefighters in California , Michigan , Montana , Wyoming and Utah
holiday weekend fires which blackened more than 6,000 acres of forest and wilderness areas
a spokeswoman for the California Department of Forestry
the largest in the forest this year
firefighters who hiked into the Absaroka-Beartooth Wilderness on Monday in south-central Montana
A four-day fire in 1,100 acres of Hiawatha National Park in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan
Sgt. Terry Leisening of the Delta County Sheriff 's Department
U.S. Forest Service spokesman Dale Bluedorn
the Stillwater River Trail inside the wilderness area
Beartooth District ranger for the Custer National Forest
